seo.title: Aalanguyil Koovum Rayyil Lyrics Parthiban Kanavu
seo.description: Get the complete Aalanguyil Koovum Rayyil Lyrics Parthiban Kanavu from Parthiban Kanavu. Read the lyrics penned by Kabilan and composed by Vidyasagar and sung by Harini. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Kabilan, Parthiban Kanavu, Vidyasagar, Harini, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
